thread.title: Chuck Berry, rock 'n' roll legend, mourned by the world
thread.title_full: Chuck Berry, rock 'n' roll legend, mourned by the world

author: Patrick Kulp
title: Chuck Berry, rock 'n' roll legend, mourned by the world
text:
Rock'n'roll legend Chuck Berry died on Saturday at the age of 90.
In the hours following his death, musicians, celebrities, and loving fans shared tributes to and memories of the man who pioneered a genre.
With hits like ‚ÄúJohnny B. Goode‚Äù and "Roll Over Beethoven," Berry defined the sound and style of rock'n'roll in its earliest stage in the 1950s.
Twitter users dredged up particularly memorable moments in his long career‚Äîlike when Berry played with the Beatles on the Mike Douglas Show in 1972‚Äîremembered his signature dance moves, and remarked on his singular impact on modern music.
R I P. And peace and love Chuck Berry Mr. rock 'n' roll music üòé‚úåÔ∏èüåüüíñüéµüé∂‚òÆ pic.twitter.com/hS2S2lUORf

R.I.P. Chuck Berry

Chuck Berry died. This breaks my heart, but 90 years old ain't bad for rock and roll. Johnny B. Goode forever.
‚Äî Stephen King (@StephenKing) March 18, 2017
RIP Chuck Berry !!!! Thank you for the poetry, the passion and the potency! GO JOHNNY GO. - KU

Music was changed forever by Chuck Berry‚Äôs indescribable impact. What a great life in music. pic.twitter.com/JA9sWI9MHg

Chuck Berry. Maybe the most important figure in all of rock and roll. His music and his influence will last forever. - Huey

The King is dead. RIP Chuck Berry.

Wow... Chuck Berry ... Rest In Peace. Just wow...
